messages.body: Hi, I'm having trouble with the mobile app sync. My tasks aren't updating between my phone and desktop app. I've tried force closing the app and reopening it, but the changes I make on desktop aren't showing up on mobile. Running latest versions on both platforms.

metadata.account_info:
* Premium user since June 2023
* Using iOS app v4.2.1
* Desktop app v2.8.0
* Last sync attempt: August 15, 2024 10:23 AM UTC
metadata.purchase_info:
* Annual Premium Plan ($99.99)
* Renewed on June 1, 2024
* No pending payments

conversation.subject: Mobile Sync Issues - Tasks Not Updating
